Package org.apache.cassandra.net

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAsyncCallback<T>
    implementors of IAsyncCallback need to make sure that any public methods are threadsafe with respect to response() being called from the message service.
    IVerbHandler<T>
    IVerbHandler provides the method that all verb handlers need to implement.
    MessagingServiceMBean
    MBean exposing MessagingService metrics.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncOneResponse<T>
    A callback specialized for returning a value from a single target; that is, this is for messages that we only send to one recipient.
    CallbackInfo
    Encapsulates the callback information.
    CompactEndpointSerializationHelper  
    IncomingStreamingConnection
    Thread to consume stream init messages.
    IncomingTcpConnection  
    MessageDeliveryTask  
    MessageIn<T>  
    MessageOut<T>  
    MessagingService  
    OutboundTcpConnection  
    OutboundTcpConnectionPool  
    ResponseVerbHandler  
    WriteCallbackInfo
